name: Silent Disco
description:
Silent Disco is what I imagine would happen if a Drum Machine designed a Platformer.

You control your running. That's all. The beat  controls your jumps, dashes and fireballs. Time your movements with care and precision to be dragged through a platforming gauntlet by the drum machine of each level.

Collect power-ups to add extra beats to the song, and reach the golden treble clef!

GMTK Game Jam 2020

This game was created in 48 hours for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020. The theme "Out of Control" inspired me to take away all the player's buttons, leaving them only with the ability to run, the rest is taken care of by the drum machine. 

Controls:

WASD/Left Stick - Move

Escape/Back - Restart Level
